bt.data

Class LocalBitfield

  • java.lang.Object
    • bt.data.Bitfield
      • bt.data.LocalBitfield

  • public abstract class LocalBitfield
extends Bitfield
    This class represents a bitfield for a local torrent

      • getSkippedBitmask

        public BitSet getSkippedBitmask()
        Returns:
        Bitmask of skipped pieces. If the n-th bit is set, then the n-th piece should be skipped.
        Since:
        1.8

      • setSkippedPieces

        public void setSkippedPieces(BitSet piecesToSkip)
        Mark pieces to download/skip with the specified BitSet. If the bit is set, this chunk is downloaded If the bit is unset, the piece is not downloaded
        Parameters:
        piecesToSkip - the pieces to skip
        Since:
        1.10

      • getPiecesSkipped

        public int getPiecesSkipped()
        Returns:
        Number of pieces that should be skipped
        Since:
        1.7

      • getPiecesNotSkipped

        public int getPiecesNotSkipped()
        Returns:
        Number of pieces that should NOT be skipped
        Since:
        1.7

      • getPiecesRemaining

        public int getPiecesRemaining()
        Returns:
        Number of pieces that have not been verified and should NOT be skipped.
        Since:
        1.0

        public void removeVerifiedPiecesFromBitset(BitSet bitSet)
